text:
Nativ Mobile | Chicago, IL | ONSITE | FULL-TIME

We are building our new product, Pairade (http://angel.co/pairade). At Pairade, we look at apps as a media channel, and the way we consume and think about apps will change in the near future; downloading will become streaming. Thus, we are creating a central hub for these apps, services, and content: a single app platform that allows you to access all your favorite stuff, instantly. It's all inside a Card.

iOS Engineer: https://angel.co/pairade/jobs/120805-ios-engineer

Feel free to email me directly (co-founder/cto): kiran@nativ.com
